Application.Handler

Class ExceptionLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ResponseEntityExceptionHandler
      • Application.Handler.ExceptionLogger

  • @ControllerAdvice
public class ExceptionLogger
extends org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ResponseEntityExceptionHandler
    The ExceptionLogger Class logs Exceptions when they take place.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Corti Lorenzo, Tocchetti Andrea

    • Method Detail

      • handleAllExceptions

        @ExceptionHandler(value=java.lang.Exception.class)
public final java.lang.String handleAllExceptions(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                     java.lang.Exception ex,
                                                                                                     javax.servlet.ServletRequest servletRequest)
        Logs the time, the kind of Exception, the line and the class that caused it for each User. Whenever a new Exception takes place, it is logged alongside all the Exceptions caused by the same User.
        Parameters:
        model - An instance of the Model class.
        ex - The caught Exception
        servletRequest - an instance of the ServletRequest class.
        Returns:
        The "error" String if any operation fails.
